deleteConnection.subtext: This action cannot be undone. The connection will be deleted from your account.
failedDeleteConnection.failedSubText: Please wait a few minutes and try again. If this does not resolve the issue, please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
runProcess.title: Beacon
runProcessFailed.subText: {processFailed}: Blue Prism Desktop cannot load the process definition. Please go back to the Library tab and try again. If this does not resolve the issue, please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
processRunning.title: Your process is currently running and you will not be able to interact with the application(s) being used by this process.
processRunning.inputStageWarning: You may be asked for additional information during the process. There might be a limited amount of time to submit the form.
processCompleted.title: Success! {processName} completed
processTerminated.title: Sorry, {processName} has not been completed
recent.title: Select process to run

recent.emptyList.subText: There are no recent processes to display - you have not yet run any processes.
recent.error.title: Unable to load recently run processes
recent.error.subText: Blue Prism Desktop cannot load the list of recently run processes. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
library.title: Select automation to run
library.emptyLibrary.title: Process library is empty
library.emptyLibrary.subText: There are currently no processes available for you to run. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
library.emptyGroup.title: Process group is empty
library.emptyGroup.subText: There are currently no processes available in this group for you to run. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
library.streamError.rootGroup.title: Unable to load library
library.streamError.title: Unable to load group
library.streamError.subText: Blue Prism Desktop cannot load the list of items, please click Reload to try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
library.groupError.rootGroup.title: Unable to load library
library.groupError.title: Unable to load group
library.groupError.subText: Blue Prism Desktop cannot load the list of items, please click Back to return to the previous page. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator for further assistance.

history.title: Session history
history.emptyView.title: Session history is empty
history.emptyView.subText: There is currently no session information available for you to view. This may be because no sessions have been run, or there is an issue. Please contact an administrator if you require further assistance.
history.error.title: Unable to load the session history
history.error.subText: Blue Prism Desktop cannot load the session history. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
history.error.viewParameters.title: Unable to load the {parameterType} parameters
history.error.viewParameters.subText: Blue Prism Desktop cannot load the {parameterType} parameters. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
history.error.viewParameters.loggingDisa: The parameters you specified are not available to view because logging for this stage is turned off.
history.dateFilter.invalidDateRange: Date range to date should be greater than the date range from date
history.timeFilter.invalidTimeRange: End time should be greater than the start time

deleteCredential.subtext: This action cannot be undone. Credential will be deleted from your account.

editCredential.password.helperText: Leave the password empty if you do not wish to change it.

notification.title: Error
formError.maximumByteLengthExceeded: Maximum length exceeded. Limit is {limit} bytes.
failedConnection.title: There was a problem connecting to Authentication Server
failedConnection.body: Authentication Server could not be reached, it may be offline or unavailable. Please try again later.
passwordReset.title: Authentication Server Password Reset
passwordReset.body: Thank you - if we find an account based on the submitted information you will recieve an email with instructions for resetting your password.
loginAuthFailure.title: There is a problem authenticating your login
loginAuthFailure.body: Blue Prism Desktop could not authenticate your login token. Please go back to the Welcome screen and try again. If this does not resolve the issue, please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
noAvailableLicenses.title: There are no available licenses
noAvailableLicenses.body: There are currently no digital worker licenses available to be associated with this computer. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
accountLicenseNotAvailableImage.title: This computer is no longer available to run Blue Prism Desktop
accountLicenseNotAvailableImage.body: The status of this computer has been changed to 'retired' for Blue Prism Desktop, which means it cannot currently run Blue Prism Desktop. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
unableToRetrieveSettings.title: There has been a problem retrieving your user settings
unableToRetrieveSettings.body: Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
unableToUpdateSettings.title: There has been a problem updating your user settings
unableToUpdateSettings.body: Blue Prism Desktop could not update your user settings at this time. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
unableToUpdateLanguage.body: Blue Prism Desktop could not update your language settings at this time. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
unableToUpdateLanguage.title: There has been a problem updating your language settings
failedResourceRegister.title: Blue Prism Desktop cannot connect to this computer
failedResourceRegister.body: Blue Prism Desktop cannot currently connect to this computer. Please wait a few minutes and try again. If this does not resolve the issue, please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
unableToConnect.title: Blue Prism Desktop cannot connect to this computer
unableToConnect.singleUrl.descriptions: Blue Prism Desktop cannot connect to the {url} web service. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
unableToConnect.pluralUrl.descriptions: Blue Prism Desktop cannot connect to {url} web services. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
logoutModal.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
common.connectionError: Blue Prism Desktop has encountered a problem. Please restart the application and try again.
closeBPDWarning.title: Confirm action to close
closeBPDWarning.message: Are you sure you want to close? If a process is running, closing Desktop will terminate the session.
BH000002: The configuration with the name {0} was not found.
BH000003: Unable to delete the only configuration.
BH000004: Your permissions have changed since you last logged in. Please log out and back in to update your access.
BH000007: There has been an error synchronizing session logs. Please contact your system administrator.
BH000013: Failed to obtain web api service {0}
BH000014: Failed to retrieve credentials from the credential store.
BH000015: Unable to add configuration as a configuration with the name '{0}' already exists.
BH000016: Failed to add credential to the credential store.
BH000017: Failed to update credentials in the credential store.
BH000018: Failed to retrieve credential from the credential store.
BH000020: Client Registration Failed. This computer is no longer available to run Blue Prism Desktop.
BH000021: Client Registration Failed. There are no available licenses.
BH000022: The import failed because the file is not in the correct format. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
BH000023: The import failed because required information is missing.
BH000024: The import failed because the connection configuration file is open or is in use by another process.
BH000026: Failed to retrieve sessions from the API.
BH000027: Failed to retrieve specified session from the API.
BH000028: Process stopped due to session timeout after {0} minutes.
BH000031: The shared connection file cannot be accessed. This may be because the file is no longer available, or you do not have the required permissions. Please contact your system administrator for further assistance.
BH000032: The import failed because a shared configuration already exists within this configuration.
BH000033: The shared connection file cannot be accessed. This may be because the file is no longer available, or you do not have the required permissions. A local backup copy is being used to proceed.
